org.pebble.core.encoding.longs.datastructures

Interface LongReferenceListsIndex

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InvertedListLongReferenceListsIndex

    public interface LongReferenceListsIndex
    Interface for LongReferenceListsStore reference lists index. This interface allows the implementation of custom strategies for indexing and searching reference list candidates that maximize compression and reading speed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListIntoListsInvertedIndex(int index, it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.longs.LongList list)
      Adds to index the given list.
      int getIndexOfReferenceList(it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.longs.LongList list, int valueBitSize, int listIndex, it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.longs.LongList[] lists, int[] offsets, int[] recursiveReferences)
      Returns index of best reference list in terms of compression and speed.
      void removeListFromListsInvertedIndex(int index, it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.longs.LongList list)
      Removes from index the given list.

    • Method Detail

      • getIndexOfReferenceList

        int getIndexOfReferenceList(it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.longs.LongList list,
                          int valueBitSize,
                          int listIndex,
                          it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.longs.LongList[] lists,
                          int[] offsets,
                          int[] recursiveReferences)
        Returns index of best reference list in terms of compression and speed.
        Parameters:
        list - for which the reference will be found.
        valueBitSize - maximum number of bits required to represent the lists values in binary representation.
        listIndex - index of the given list.
        lists - set of reference lists.
        offsets - respective offset of reference lists for lists.
        recursiveReferences - respective number of recursive references for lists.
        Returns:
        index of best reference list in terms of compression and speed. Can be -1 when a good candidate can't be found.

        Adds to index the given list.
        Parameters:
        index - of list.
        list - to be added to reference list index.

                                    it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.longs.LongList list)
        Removes from index the given list.
        Parameters:
        index - of list.
        list - to be added to reference list index.
